article.headline: Fairfield 84, Sacred Heart 75
article.story: BRIDGEPORT, Conn. (AP) -- Jonathan Han scored a career-high 22 points Sunday night as Fairfield defeated Sacred Heart, 84-75, in the first meeting of crosstown rivals. Greg Nero, who shot 7 of 10, added 21 points for the Stags. Mamadou Diakhate had 12 points and Anthony Johnson 10 points and a game-high 11 rebounds for Fairfield (2-2). Chauncey Hardy had 19 points to lead the winless Pioneers (0-4), the preseason No. 1 pick in the Northeast Conference. Drew Shubik had 14, Corey Hassan 11 and Brice Brooks 10. After trailing 25-12, Fairfield closed out the half with a 30-10 run to take a 42-35 halftime lead. Sacred Heart had led by as much as 14 as Hassan hit three 3-pointers to lift the Pioneers to a 21-7 lead with 13:13 remaining in the half. The Pioneers, who committed 22 turnovers to offset 29 of 57 shooting (50.9 percent), came no closer than four in the second half. Sacred Heart, which joined the Division I ranks in 1999-2000, is based five miles away from Fairfield in suburban Connecticut.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
